Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
can I create a new pixel for my ad account

Yes, you can create a new pixel for your ad account. To do this, go to the 'Tools' section in your NewsBreak Ad Manager, access the 'Event Tracking' tab, and select 'Create new event.' Follow the steps to integrate your Pixel or Postback. If you need more detailed instructions, check out this article: [Introduction to tCPA](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17827591199757-Introduction-to-tCPA). Let me know if you have any other questions!
that's for a new pixel event
but how do you create an entirely new pixel

Got it! If you're looking to create a new pixel event, you can follow the steps in the NewsBreak Ad Manager under 'Tools' > 'Event Tracking.' Choose 'Create new event' and specify your event type. You can also refer to this article for more detailed guidance: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel with GTM](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/14333966189581-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-with-GTM). Let me know if there's anything else you need help with!

To create an entirely new pixel for your ad account, you need to log into your NewsBreak Ad Manager and navigate to the 'Tools' section. From there, go to 'Event Management' and choose 'Pixel' as your tracking type. Specify your integration method and event type, then follow the instructions provided to generate the code. You can find more detailed information in this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel with GTM](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/14333966189581-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-with-GTM). Let me know if you need further assistance!
